title: Cheapest RTX Vs Most Expensive: 3050 vs 3090 Ti
description: *Sponsor* Go check out the Corsair K70 Pro RGB here: (Affiliate link)   In another pointless comparison, I see how much of more performance do you get going from the baby RTX graphics card, to the big daddy.  Both the graphics cards were sent by Gigabyte.
